articles.author: Abubakar Siddique
articles.title: Syrian Islamist Rulers Shun The Taliban Governance Model - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Syria's new Islamist rulers, Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), have swiftly moved to distance themselves from how the Taliban is ruling Afghanistan. The HTS leader has promised to allow women's education and pledged to form an inclusive government to unite their di…
articles.content:
Afghanistan's Taliban rulers were quick to congratulate fellow Islamists from Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) on toppling Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's government.
As the HTS fighters seized the cap… [+4921 chars]
